overview: From 2025-12-15 to 2025-12-16, ethereum-optimism/supersim had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 18 active contributors.

topContributors.summary: atenalt: Activated hardforks for Cyber Mainnet and Funki Mainnet by merging two pull requests, ethereum-optimism/superchain-registry#1183 and ethereum-optimism/superchain-registry#1182, demonstrating a focus on critical network updates.

Inphi: Primarily focused on configuration updates, merging a PR to update the pinned Kona client version in `ethereum-optimism/optimism#18611` and modifying 26 files with 842 additions and 164 deletions. They also created and closed an issue related to running precompile FP tests on the Jovian fork (`ethereum-optimism/optimism#17348`), and provided 3 reviews, including 2 approvals.
janjakubnanista: Contributed to bugfix work today, merging a PR in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#18610) that added a `SafeRename` ioutil utility, reflecting a focus on code utility and maintenance.

pauldowman: Focused on maintenance and testing within the Optimism ecosystem, merging a PR to add Kona 1.2.7 to standard-prestates.toml in ethereum-optimism/superchain-registry (#1184) and creating an issue to ensure Kona interop action tests are not disabled in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#18613).
AmadiMichael: Focused on bugfix work, making 1 commit that modified 1 file with a net change of -1 lines, and provided 7 review comments.
almanax-ai: No activity today.
pcw109550: Focused on bugfix work, modifying 26 files with a net change of +349 lines across a single commit, and provided 5 review comments.

ajsutton: Focused on enhancing testing infrastructure, specifically enabling jovian for proofs precompile tests in `ethereum-optimism/optimism` via PR #18606, demonstrating a primary focus on tests work.

ccerv1: Focused on feature work, opening PR ethereum-optimism/op-analytics#1774 to add CSV dumps for RF Seasons 7-8, which involved modifying 6 files with a significant addition of 5377 lines, primarily in documentation.
op-will: No activity today.
geoknee: No activity today.

copilot-swe-agent: Today's activity centered on repository maintenance, with an open pull request in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#18607) aimed at removing compiled binaries, and one review comment provided.
sbvegan: Modified 2 files across 2 commits, with an even split between bugfix and other work, and provided 2 approval reviews.

devin-ai-integration: Focused on improving test coverage for the AdminFaucetAuthModule, as evidenced by an open pull request in ethereum-optimism/optimism#18609, and provided a comment on a pull request.
einar-oplabs: No activity today.

0xOneTony: Today's activity involved significant code modifications across 280 files, resulting in a net addition of 3828 lines over 2 commits, with a primary focus on "other work" as indicated by the diverse file types touched. Additionally, they provided 2 review comments on pull requests.
stevennevins: Primarily focused on bugfix work, modifying 222 files across 41 commits with a net change of +1271 lines, and also provided two review comments.
karlfloersch: Provided a change request on one pull request and left two PR comments, indicating engagement in code quality and review processes.
zhwrd: No activity today.
smartcontracts: Today, smartcontracts engaged in a single commit, modifying 1 file with a net addition of 41 lines, primarily focused on other work, and provided one PR comment.
maurelian: Focused on various tasks, including other work, bug fixes, and tests, modifying 39 files across 18 commits with a net change of +601 lines of code.
0xiamflux: Focused on bugfix and other work, making 2 commits that modified 3 files (+6/-4 lines) and provided 1 review comment.

lyh169: Focused on identifying and reporting a potential bug, creating issue #18608 in ethereum-optimism/optimism to report an "invalid memory address or nil pointer derefe..." error in op-challenger, and also engaged in discussions by commenting on two issues.

Choi-Seong-Yong: Identified and reported a potential execution issue with the `create-l2-rollup-example` tutorial by creating issue ethereum-optimism/docs#1919, indicating a focus on documentation accuracy and user experience.
Abed1234560: Focused on documentation improvement by creating an issue in ethereum-optimism/docs#1918.

0xniha: Today, 0xniha initiated a new issue in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#18612) to address the removal of deprecated OPCMv1 fields, indicating a focus on code maintenance and cleanup within the Optimism ecosystem.
